title: My friend got to silver, but his square still shows bronze
body: I had same problem at the start of season, when i was bronze, but it showed silver.

replies.body:
It won't show until after the season ends and he gets his border.
Borders don't update _throughout_ the season, only at the end :)
Maybe you are right. I don't know what boarder is so i will still show a rioter a photo of what i am seeing tho..
Gotchu bro.  You're in good hands with _Broporo_^^
He may just need to close and reopen his client to make that profile update correctly. Give that a try and let me know if it's not working.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=lU15HhcM,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-23T20:57:46.712+0000)
>
> He may just need to close and reopen his client to make that profile update correctly. Give that a try and let me know if it's not working.

It isn't working :(. The square before game still shows red/blue instead of silver. ( in loading screen)
Mind shooting me a quick screenshot of what you're seeing? I was able to check your profile on the backend and it *is* showing you as Silver 4
Oh sorry if i made u worry. I was mistaken, and boarders show for last season, not for the one you are in now. Sorry again :(
It is showing me as silver, but my friend  named: "pro rusher 1" has this problem. I will take a photo when i get from school.
